artist: Artist: Mimmo Paladino; Publisher: Waddington Graphics, London
description: three abstract prints in predominantly black and white; left image: hand and arm at bottom; red heart-like shape in URC; face-like image at top center with three horns; curving form made up of groups of three black marks in LLC; central image: cross topped with abstract head at bottom center; torso and head of figure in line drawing style at center; black areas at top corners; right image: quadruped with a gold gross behind in at bottom; faces, LLC and top center; hand at center left; scratchy marks throughout; smudgy area at center
image_copyright: © 1986 Mimmo Paladino %2F Artists Rights Society %28ARS%29%2C New York
markings: LLC of each print, in pencil: 9/28 | LRC of a, publisher\'s blindstamp: WG | artist\'s blindstamp: MP | printer\'s stamp: GU
medium: Etching, drypoint, sugar-lift aquatint, open-bite etching, carborundum and gold leaf in three parts
provenance: Dolly J. Fiterman, Minneapolis; given to MIA, 2016
signed: LRC of each print, in pencil: Mimmo Paladino 1986
title: Sirene, Vespero, Poeta Occidentale
